DOC.brief_summary: Over past several decade , considerable effort expend toward successful cryopreservation various human cell . While attempt cryopreservation direct different tissue type , one vigorously pursue target reproductive tissue . Historically , cryopreservation human sperm exist several decade . The early report pregnancy ( Trounson et al. , 1983 ) birth ( Zeilmaker et al. , 1984 ) cryopreservation human embryo occur early 1980s . Presently , freeze storage human embryo follow vitro fertilization ( IVF ) standard practice fertility clinic . In 2003 , CDC Assisted Reproductive Technology success rate report state 4,246 live birth occur 17,517 non-donor frozen embryo cycle . . Because human egg relatively voluminous cell abundant cytoplasm , crystallization time freezing may result damage organelle . Secondly , mature metaphase II oocyte contains fragile spindle apparatus involve cleavage . The purpose research study evaluate method freeze thaw oocyte . This evaluation make compare survival rate rate fertilization , cleavage embryo quality fresh oocytes frozen-thawed oocyte inseminate IVF ( vitro fertilization ) treatment cycle . In addition , comparison make frozen oocyte infertile woman egg donor . You ask study currently undergo vitro fertilization .
DOC.brief_title: Oocyte Cryopreservation : Evaluation Oocyte Freezing Thawing Technique
DOC.criteria: To eligible inclusion study , subject must satisfy follow criterion : 1 . Infertile woman wish conceive whose physician recommend undergo IVF . 2 . Participants must age 21 35 year 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 38 . 4 . Serum result cycle day 3 FSH < 10 mIU/ml . 5 . Must male partner whose semen analysis meet clinic criterion ICSI . Use donor sperm also acceptable . 6 . Be willing able comply protocol duration study . 7 . Have voluntarily provide write informed consent WIRB , prior studyrelated procedure part normal medical care , understanding subject may withdraw consent start Lupron without prejudice future medical care . A patient may NOT enter study present ANY follow criterion : 1 . Clinically significant systemic disease . 2 . Known endometriosis Grade III IV ( ASRM classification ) . 3 . Any previous cycle indicate low response gonadotropin stimulation ( defined retrieval < 10 egg retrieval ) 4 . Three previous ART cycle without clinical pregnancy 5 . Abnormal , undiagnosed , gynecological bleeding . 6 . Previous ovarian surgery 7 . Known allergy hypersensitivity recombinant gonadotropin preparation studyrelated medication . 8 . Known current substance abuse . 9 . Simultaneous participation another clinical trial . 10 . Current smoker . 11 . An extrauterine pregnancy within last 3 month OCP treatment commences . 12 . Previous participation similar study different center .
